name: Luna's Journey
description:
This project was created as a submission for the Indie Game Academy Jelly Jam.

A casual adventure game; where you guide Luna, the Luna Moth, through a withered forest and restore life back to the rocks and flora of the forest. It is a short adventure however, as Luna Moths live for only a short period of time. In this adventure, Luna only has from sun up until sun down to restore as much life and beauty back to the world as possible.

HOW TO PLAY

Press or Hold Spacebar to fly higher into the air.

Release Spacebar to glide back down.

CREDITS

Development by Josef Reif & Mr. JBRPG

3D Graphics by Saruman77 (Vincent Francois)

2D Graphics by anonymousbadger

Audio by Bmusedd (Jack Ó Muircheartaigh)
